title: Nordstrom May 2009 Catalog font ID
content:
Please help me ID this handwritten script font used in the Nordstrom Catalog for May 2009.  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090715155154im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NordstromCatalog0509_6553.jpg)
author: TypeOh

comments.content:
I havenâ€™t found it yet, but Typadelic has a number of similar looks, including [Sunnydale](http://web.archive.org/web/20090715155154/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/typadelic/sunnydale/). [Font Bros](http://web.archive.org/web/20090715155154/http:/www.fontbros.com/index.php) might be another good place to look, since many of their foundries feature informal scripts like this.

- Mike Yanega
